characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na toplim, sunčanim lokalitetima s dobro dreniranim i plodnim zemljištem. Zahteva redovno navodnjavanje tokom sušnih perioda.

subvarietys.about: Cosford je engleska sorta lešnika poznata po visokom kvalitetu ploda i pouzdanoj rodnosti. Zbog svog ukusnog jezgra i dobre adaptabilnosti, često se gaji i kao oprašivač za druge sorte. Pogodna je za profesionalne zasade, ali i za dvorišne voćnjake.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je srednje krupan do krupan, izduženog oblika, sa tankom ljuskom i punim, ukusnim jezgrom koje se lako odvaja. Jezgro ima prijatan, blag i sladak ukus, cenjeno i u svežem i u sušenom obliku.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Plodovi sazrevaju krajem avgusta do početka septembra. Berba se obavlja kada plod sam otpadne iz omotača.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na dobro dreniranom, plodnom tlu sa blago kiselom do neutralnom pH vrednošću (6,0–7,0). Ne podnosi zadržavanje vode.

subvarietys.about: Hall’s Giant je jedna od najpoznatijih i najrasprostranjenijih sorti lešnika, poreklom iz Nemačke. Cenjena je zbog izuzetne rodnosti, velikih plodova i snažnog rasta. Odlična je kao osnovna sorta u komercijalnim zasadima i veoma dobro reaguje na orezivanje.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je vrlo krupan, duguljast, u izduženoj omotnici. Jezgro je svetlo, krupno, prijatnog ukusa i lako se odvaja iz ljuske. Ljuska je čvrsta, srednje debljine.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Berba se obavlja tokom septembra, kada plodovi počnu sami da ispadaju iz omotača.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na dubljim, dobro dreniranima zemljištima bogatim humusom. Potrebna umerena vlaga i dobra izloženost suncu.

subvarietys.about: Istarski dugi je tradicionalna sorta lešnika, poreklom sa područja Istre. Cenjena je zbog specifičnog oblika ploda, ujednačenosti, kao i dobrog kvaliteta jezgra. Dobro se prilagođava različitim klimatskim uslovima i ima dobru rodnost.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je izdužen, srednje veličine do krupniji, sa tanjom ljuskom koja se lako lomi. Jezgro je ukusno, ujednačeno, lako se odvaja i ima dobru tržišnu vrednost.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva krajem avgusta do početka septembra, zavisno od uslova. Plodovi se lako skupljaju jer ispadaju iz omotača kada su zreli.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na propusnim, rastresitim i dobro osunčanim terenima sa srednje plodnim do plodnim zemljištem.

subvarietys.about: Istarski okrugli je autohtona sorta lešnika sa područja Istre, poznata po dobro formiranim, okruglim plodovima i kvalitetnom jezgru. Zbog otpornosti, prilagodljivosti i dobrog ukusa, često se gaji u tradicionalnim zasadima.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je srednje veličine, pravilno okrugao, sa čvrstom, ali ne predebelom ljuskom. Jezgro je ukusno, sočno i vrlo cenjeno, naročito u konditorskoj industriji.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Plodovi sazrevaju krajem avgusta, lako se skupljaju jer ispadaju iz omotača kad su potpuno zreli.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na osunčanim i toplim položajima, sa rastresitim, dobro dreniranim zemljištem, umerene plodnosti.

subvarietys.about: Ludolphs Zellernuss je atraktivna sorta lešnika prepoznatljiva po dekorativnom crvenkastom lišću i crvenim omotačima plodova. Pored upotrebne vrednosti, često se gaji i kao ukrasna sorta u okućnicama i manjim zasadima.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je srednje krupan, sa crvenim omotačem i blago izduženom, čvrstom ljuskom. Jezgro je svetlo, ukusno i pogodno za konzumaciju u svežem stanju.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva krajem avgusta do početka septembra, plodovi se lako skupljaju jer otpadaju iz omotača pri zrelosti.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Voli dobro drenirana, plodna zemljišta i sunčane položaje. Može uspevati i u baštama zbog svoje dekorativnosti.

subvarietys.about: Römische Zellernuss je tradicionalna, nemačka sorta lešnika poznata po dobroj rodnosti i velikom jezgru. Iako je manje zastupljena u savremenim plantažama, cenjena je zbog stabilnog prinosa i otpornosti.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je veći, sa čvrstom i debljom ljuskom, često izduženog oblika. Jezgro je umereno veliko, prijatnog ukusa i lako se odvaja.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Plodovi sazrevaju krajem avgusta do početka septembra. Sorta je poznata po redovnom i stabilnom prinosu.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na plodnim, umerenim i dobro dreniranim zemljištima, ali je tolerantna i prema nešto siromašnijim uslovima.

subvarietys.about: Tonda Gentile Romana je cenjena italijanska sorta lešnika poreklom iz regiona Lacio. Ističe se kvalitetnim, aromatičnim jezgrom i odličnom obradivošću, što je čini vrlo traženom u konditorskoj industriji. Poznata je po otpornosti i prilagodljivosti različitim uslovima uzgoja.
main: Dobra otpornost na bolesti i štetočine

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je srednje veličine, pravilnog okruglog oblika, sa tankom i lako lomljivom ljuskom. Jezgro je ukusno, homogeno i aromatično – idealno za prženje i mlevenje.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva krajem avgusta, često ujednačeno, što olakšava mehanizovanu berbu.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje rezultate daje na plodnim, blago kiselim do neutralnim zemljištima, uz dobru drenažu i dovoljnu osvetljenost.

subvarietys.about: Jedna od najcenjenijih sorti lešnika na svetu, poreklom iz oblasti Langhe u Pijemontu (Italija). Poznata je po izuzetnoj aromi, visokom procentu jezgra i tankoj ljusci – smatra se referentnom sortom za proizvodnju vrhunskih konditorskih proizvoda.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je gotovo savršeno okrugao, srednje veličine, sa tankom ljuskom. Jezgro je ujednačeno, lako se odvaja od ljuske, blago slatko, sa prepoznatljivom i finom aromom – naročito izraženom nakon prženja.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva u drugoj polovini avgusta do početka septembra, sa ujednačenim zrenjem pogodnim za mehanizovanu berbu.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na plodnim, dobro dreniranima i blago kiselim zemljištima, na sunčanim i zaklonjenim položajima.

subvarietys.about: Champion je američka sorta oraha, poznata po izuzetno velikim plodovima, dobrom otpornosti na bolesti i ranoj rodnosti. Cenjena je u komercijalnoj proizvodnji zbog stabilnih prinosa i lake obrade jezgra.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su vrlo veliki (do 15 g), sa tankim, glatkim oklopom i svetlim, ukusnim jezgrom koje se lako odvaja i retko lomljivo. Jezgro zauzima veliki procenat zapremine ploda.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Zri krajem septembra, često među prvim sortama oraha koje dospevaju za berbu.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na dubokim, plodnim i dobro dreniranim zemljištima, sa dovoljno vlage i mogućnošću navodnjavanja. Ne voli previše teška i vlažna tla.

subvarietys.about: Čendler je jedna od najpoznatijih i najcenjenijih sorti oraha u svetu, poreklom iz Kalifornije. Plod je krupan, izduženo-eliptičnog oblika, sa svetlim, glatkim i lako odvojivim jezgrom koje se naročito ceni u konditorskoj industriji i za svežu upotrebu. Chandler rađa rano i veoma je zahvalan za negu i održavanje, zbog nižeg rasta koji omogućava laku berbu.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je krupan, eliptičnog oblika. Jezgro je glatko, svetložute boje, veoma prijatnog, blago slatkastog ukusa. Pogodno za sveže konzumiranje i konditorsku industriju.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Kraj septembra do početka oktobra, u zavisnosti od lokacije i klime.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na dubokim, rastresitim i plodnim zemljištima sa dobrom drenažom. Zahteva osunčana mesta i umerenu dobru vlažnost zemljišta.

subvarietys.about: Geisenheim 139 je nemačka sorta oraha, dobijena selekcijom u institutu u Geisenheimu. Odlikuje se ranim početkom rodnosti, dobrom otpornošću na mraz i bolesti, i kompaktnom krošnjom, što je čini pogodnom za gušći sklop sadnje.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su srednje veličine, sa tanjim oklopom i kvalitetnim svetlim jezgrom. Jezgro se lako odvaja, bez većih oštećenja, i odličnog je ukusa.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Zri u drugoj polovini septembra, među ranim sortama. Počinje da rađa već u trećoj godini nakon sadnje.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Dobro uspeva na umereno plodnim i rastresitim zemljištima, ali se pokazala otporna i na slabije uslove – pogodna je i za brdsko-planinske krajeve.

subvarietys.about: Domaći orah (Juglans regia) je autohtona sorta koja se od davnina gaji u našim krajevima. Poznat je po dugovečnosti, otpornosti na vremenske nepogode i prilagodljivosti različitim uslovima. Iako nejednolikog kvaliteta plodova, i dalje se često koristi zbog otpornosti i obilne rodnosti.
main: Visoka otpornost na mraz i sušu

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su neujednačeni, često sa debljim i tvrđim oklopom, ali sa punim, aromatičnim jezgrom. Jezgro se teže odvaja, često lomljivo.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Berba se obavlja krajem septembra i početkom oktobra, u zavisnosti od nadmorske visine i položaja.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Vrlo prilagodljiv, može uspevati i na siromašnijim zemljištima, a posebno se ističe u brdsko-planinskim krajevima i šumskim područjima.

subvarietys.about: Lara je moderna francuska sorta oraha, poznata po ranoj rodnosti, velikim plodovima i izuzetno kvalitetnom jezgru. Zahvaljujući dobroj prilagodljivosti i odličnim osobinama ploda, postaje sve popularnija kako u profesionalnim zasadima, tako i u manjim voćnjacima.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je veći od proseka, okruglastog oblika, sa glatkom i tanjom ljuskom. Jezgro je svetložute boje, dobro popunjava ljusku, i ima blag, prijatan ukus bez gorčine. Lako se odvaja i idealno je za prodaju u jezgru.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Zreli plodovi se beru krajem septembra. Orah zri ravnomerno, što olakšava mehanizovano ili ručno sakupljanje.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na dubokim, rastresitim i plodnim zemljištima, sa dobrom propustljivošću i umerenom vlažnošću. Ne podnosi lošu drenažu. Pogodna je i za intenzivne zasade, uz odgovarajuću negu.

subvarietys.about: Mire je domaća rana sorta oraha, dobijena selekcijom sa ciljem ranijeg sazrevanja i stabilnog prinosa. Karakteriše je dobro popunjeno jezgro, kvalitetan plod i srednja bujnost stabla, što je čini pogodnom i za intenzivnije zasade.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je srednje krupan, sa tanjim i glatkijim oklopom, što omogućava lako vađenje jezgra. Jezgro je svetle boje, ukusno i punog kvaliteta, pogodno za konzumaciju i preradu.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Rana sorta – sazreva krajem avgusta do početka septembra, među najranijima kod nas.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na plodnim, dubokim i dobro dreniranim zemljištima, ali pokazuje i dobru prilagodljivost u različitim uslovima.

subvarietys.about: Novosadski kasni je domaća sorta oraha stvorena na Institutu za voćarstvo u Novom Sadu. Izdvaja se kasnim kretanjem vegetacije, što ga čini otpornim na prolećne mrazeve. Pogodna je za komercijalnu proizvodnju zbog krupnih plodova, dobrog kvaliteta jezgra i stabilnog prinosa.
main: Pogodno za sušenje, čuvanje i prodaju

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plod je krupan do vrlo krupan, sa tanjim oklopom i dobro razvijenim jezgrom, koje je svetle boje, suvo i ukusno. Jezgro se lako vadi iz oklopa i ima dobar odnos mase jezgra i ukupne mase ploda.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva u drugoj polovini septembra, a često i krajem meseca – idealan za kasnu berbu i duže čuvanje.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na dubokim, rastresitim i plodnim zemljištima s dobrom drenažom. Dobro podnosi suve i kontinentalne klime.

subvarietys.about: Rasna je domaća selekcionisana sorta oraha, poreklom iz Srbije. Cenjena je zbog visokog i redovnog prinosa, kvalitetnog jezgra i dobre prilagodljivosti različitim agroekološkim uslovima. Pogodna je za intenzivne zasade, ali i za manje porodične voćnjake.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su srednje krupni do krupni, sa tanjom, lako lomljivom ljuskom. Jezgro je svetložuto, punog ukusa, dobro popunjava oklop i lako se vadi – pogodno za komercijalnu upotrebu i preradu.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Bere se krajem septembra do početka oktobra, uz visok sadržaj ulja i suve materije, što omogućava duže čuvanje.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Dobro uspeva na dubokim, umereno vlažnim, plodnim zemljištima, sa dobrom drenažom. Pogodna je za različite klimatske uslove, ali najbolje rezultate daje u toplijim područjima sa dosta sunca.

subvarietys.about: Šejnovo je priznata domaća sorta oraha, selekcionisana u Srbiji. Prepoznatljiva je po ranom stupanju u rod, visokom prinosu, kao i po kvalitetnom jezgru. Često se koristi za komercijalnu proizvodnju zbog svoje pouzdanosti i brzog povrata investicije.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su srednje krupni, sa tanjom ljuskom koja se lako lomi. Jezgro je svetložute boje, čvrsto, ujednačeno, i punog, prijatnog ukusa. Lako se vadi u celosti, što je prednost kod prodaje jezgra.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Berba počinje sredinom do kraja septembra. Orah zri ravnomerno, što olakšava organizaciju branja i sušenja.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na plodnim, dubokim, rastresitim zemljištima, sa dobrom drenažom. Dobro podnosi različite agroekološke uslove, ali daje najbolje rezultate u toplijim krajevima sa umerenom vlagom.

subvarietys.about: Achilles je visoko cenjena sorta crvenog ogrozda, poreklom iz Nemačke. Odlikuje se atraktivnim plodovima, bogatim ukusom i dobrom otpornošću na bolesti. Zahvaljujući svom estetskom i nutritivnom kvalitetu, često se koristi kako za svežu potrošnju, tako i za preradu. Pogodna je za uzgoj u voćnjacima, ali i u manjim, kućnim zasadima.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su srednje krupni do krupni, tamnocrvene boje, sjajni i vrlo privlačni. Meso je sočno, aromatično, prijatno kiselkasto-slatko, sa izraženim sortnim karakterom. Idealan je za konzumaciju u svežem stanju, kao i za izradu džemova, sokova i drugih prerađevina.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Achilles sazreva sredinom jula. Plodovi dozrevaju ravnomerno i pogodni su za ručnu berbu u više navrata tokom 10–15 dana.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje rezultate daje na dobro dreniranom, umereno vlažnom i plodnom zemljištu. Otporan je na pepelnicu, što ga čini pogodnim za ekološki i niskointenzivni uzgoj.

subvarietys.about: Hinnonmäki Grün je poznata finska sorta ogrozda koja se odlikuje izuzetnom otpornošću i prilagodljivošću hladnijim klimatskim uslovima. Plodovi su svetlozeleni, prijatnog slatko-kiselkastog ukusa i veoma osvežavajući. Zbog svoje otpornosti na bolesti i stabilnih prinosa, često se preporučuje za ekološku i amatersku proizvodnju.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su srednje veličine, okruglasti i glatki, svetlozelene boje. Meso je čvrsto, vrlo sočno, sa prijatnim balansom između slatkoće i blage kiselosti. Ukus je osvežavajuć i lagan, što ga čini pogodnim za konzumaciju u svežem stanju, ali i za preradu u sokove i džemove.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva sredinom do kraja jula. Berba je ravnomerna, a plodovi ostaju stabilni na žbunu čak i kada potpuno sazru.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Dobro uspeva na lakšim, humusnim i dobro dreniranima zemljištima. Zbog svoje otpornosti na pepelnicu i niske temperature, pogodna je i za zasade u hladnijim krajevima i ekološki uzgoj.

subvarietys.about: Hinnonmäki Gul je švedska sorta ogrozda sa prepoznatljivim zlatno-žutim plodovima i odličnim ukusom. Stvorena je za otpornost na niske temperature i bolesti, posebno pepelnicu. Ova sorta je vrlo pogodna za svežu potrošnju, ali i za preradu, zbog uravnoteženog odnosa šećera i kiselina.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su srednje veličine, oblo-ovalnog oblika, zlatno-žute boje i glatke pokožice. Meso je sočno, nežno, sa blagim i prijatnim slatko-kiselkastim ukusom. Odlično se konzumira svež, ali se često koristi i za izradu kompota, marmelada i voćnih sirupa.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva sredinom jula, sa ujednačenim zrenjem i lakoćom branja. Plodovi dugo ostaju čvrsti na žbunu nakon sazrevanja.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Uspeva na dobro dreniranom, blago kiselom do neutralnom zemljištu, ali se odlično prilagođava i u siromašnijim uslovima. Idealna za hladnije klimatske oblasti i zasade bez intenzivne hemijske zaštite.

subvarietys.about: Hinnonmäki Röd je cenjena crvena sorta ogrozda, poreklom iz Finske, poznata po izuzetnoj otpornosti na bolesti i niske temperature. Plodovi su dekorativni, slatko-kiselkastog ukusa, idealni za svežu konzumaciju, ali i za preradu. Ova sorta je zahvalna za uzgoj u različitim uslovima i pogodna za baštenske zasade bez intenzivne nege.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su srednje veličine, tamnocrvene boje, sa blagom čupavom pokožicom. Meso je sočno, izraženog slatko-kiselog ukusa, vrlo osvežavajuće. Zbog bogate boje i izražene arome, posebno je tražena za domaću preradu (džemove, sirupe, sokove).

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva u drugoj polovini jula. Plodovi se beru lako i ravnomerno dozrevaju, što olakšava planiranje berbe.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Uspeva na različitim vrstama zemljišta, ali najbolje rezultate daje na umereno vlažnim, dobro dreniranima površinama sa dovoljno svetlosti. Pogodna i za hladnije klimatske uslove, zahvaljujući finskom poreklu.

subvarietys.about: Invicta je poznata sorta ogrozda britanskog porekla, cenjena zbog svoje izuzetne rodnosti i otpornosti na bolesti, naročito pepelnicu. Plodovi su krupni, zeleno-žute boje, prijatnog slatko-kiselog ukusa, što je čini odličnim izborom za svežu potrošnju, kao i za preradu. Zbog svoje prilagodljivosti, Invicta je čest izbor i u profesionalnoj i u amaterskoj proizvodnji.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su veliki, ovalni do blago izduženi, sa zeleno-žutom, glatkom pokožicom. Meso je sočno, osvežavajuće i uravnoteženog slatko-kiselog ukusa. Zbog svoje veličine i čvrstoće, plodovi dobro podnose transport i lako se beru.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva sredinom jula. Daje visok i stabilan prinos iz godine u godinu, sa plodovima koji ujednačeno dozrevaju.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na sunčanim, dobro dreniranima parcelama, ali je zahvalna i u nešto težim uslovima. Izuzetno tolerantna na bolesti, što omogućava uzgoj sa minimalnom hemijskom zaštitom.

subvarietys.about: Whinham's Industry je stara i cenjena sorta ogrozda engleskog porekla, poznata po tamnocrvenim plodovima prijatnog ukusa. Odlikuje se izraženom aromom i dekorativnim izgledom, zbog čega se posebno ističe među sortama tamne boje. Pogodna je za svežu konzumaciju, ali i za pripremu džemova, sokova i kompota. Ujedno je i sorta koja se često koristi u tradicionalnoj domaćoj preradi.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su srednje do krupne veličine, tamnocrvene do bordo boje, često blago dlakavi. Meso je mekano, aromatično, sa balansiranom slatkoćom i osvežavajućom kiselošću, što je čini veoma prijatnom za jelo direktno sa grma.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva sredinom jula. Dozrevanje je ujednačeno, a berba se može obavljati tokom više dana zahvaljujući postepenom zrenju plodova.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na plodnim, dobro dreniranima zemljištima sa puno sunca. Sorta je nešto osetljivija na pepelnicu, pa se preporučuje redovno orezivanje i proređivanje grmova radi bolje provetrenosti i smanjenja rizika od bolesti.

subvarietys.about: White Pearl, poznata i kao Beli Biser, je rana do srednje rana sorta bele ribizle koja se odlikuje nežnim, svetlim bobicama i prijatno slatkastim ukusom. Zbog svoje blage arome i niske kiselosti, izuzetno je pogodna za svežu potrošnju, dekoraciju poslastica, kao i za proizvodnju sokova i želea. Ova sorta se često bira i zbog dekorativnog izgleda grozdova u vrtovima.

characteristics.title: Plodovi i ukus:
characteristics.text: Grozdovi su srednje dugi do dugi, pravilno raspoređeni, sa sitnijim do srednje krupnim bobicama mlečno-bele do skoro prozirne boje. Ukus je vrlo prijatan, blago aromatičan, sa niskom kiselinom, što je čini idealnom za one koji izbegavaju kiselo voće.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Dozreva u drugoj polovini juna, neretko među prvim belim ribizlama. Berba traje relativno kratko, ali su plodovi postojani na žbunu.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: White Pearl uspeva na osunčanim i polusenovitim mestima, uz umereno vlažno i dobro drenirano zemljište. Potrebno je redovno rezanje starih grana kako bi se podstakla obnova mladih, rodnih izdanaka.

subvarietys.about: Jonkheer van Tets je jedna od najpoznatijih i najranijih sorti crvene ribizle, poreklom iz Holandije. Cenjena je zbog svoje rane zrelosti, obilnog roda i atraktivnih, sjajno crvenih bobica. Zbog osvežavajuće arome i izražene kiselosti, odlična je za sokove, džemove i druge prerađevine, ali i za svežu konzumaciju. Izuzetno je pogodna za gajenje u kontinentalnim uslovima.

characteristics.title: Plodovi i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su srednje do krupni, sakupljeni u dugačke grozdove sa lepo raspoređenim bobicama intenzivne crvene boje. Ukus je karakteristično kiselkast, bogat aromom, što je čini odličnim izborom za sokove i želee, kao i za zamrzavanje.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Jedna je od najranijih sorti crvene ribizle – sazreva već u drugoj polovini juna, što omogućava ranu ponudu na tržištu i odličan početak sezone.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Odlično uspeva na plodnim, dobro dreniranima zemljištima, na osunčanim mestima. Potrebno je redovno orezivanje kako bi se očuvala rodnost i dobar kvalitet ploda. Otporna je na uobičajene bolesti ribizle i prilagodljiva je različitim klimatskim uslovima.

subvarietys.about: Rolan je visokorodna sorta crvene ribizle nemačkog porekla, poznata po velikim grozdovima i odličnim agronomskim osobinama. Plodovi su vizuelno privlačni, blago sjajni, intenzivno crvene boje, sa blagom kiselinom i prijatnim ukusom. Ova sorta je naročito pogodna za komercijalnu proizvodnju zbog ujednačenog sazrevanja, lake berbe i otpornosti na bolesti.

characteristics.title: Plodovi i ukus:
characteristics.text: Bobice su srednje do krupne, blago spljoštene, intenzivno crvene i sjajne. Meso je sočno, sa osvežavajućim, blago kiselkastim ukusom, čime je idealna za svežu potrošnju, sokove, džemove i industrijsku preradu.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva u srednjem roku, obično u prvoj polovini jula. Odlikuje se ravnomernim sazrevanjem plodova u grozdu, što omogućava efikasniju berbu.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Rolan se ističe robusnim rastom i dobrom prilagodljivošću različitim uslovima gajenja. Podnosi gušći sklop sadnje, a grmovi su uspravnog habitusa, što olakšava rezidbu i negu. Pokazuje dobru otpornost na američku pepelnicu i druge uobičajene bolesti ribizle.

subvarietys.about: Rovada je jedna od najpoznatijih i najcenjenijih sorti crvene ribizle u savremenoj proizvodnji. Potiče iz Holandije i ističe se izuzetno dugim grozdovima, ujednačenim i dekorativnim plodovima, kao i visokim prinosima. Zahvaljujući atraktivnom izgledu i odličnoj postojanosti nakon berbe, veoma je tražena na tržištu svežeg voća i pogodna za izvozne programe.

characteristics.title: Plodovi i ukus:
characteristics.text: Bobice su srednje krupne, sjajne, svetlocrvene boje, čvrste teksture i prijatnog, blago kiselkastog ukusa. Plodovi su nanizani u dugim grozdovima (često preko 15 cm), ravnomerno sazrevaju i ne otpadaju lako, što olakšava berbu.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Rovada je kasna sorta, sazreva krajem jula ili početkom avgusta. Produžen period berbe omogućava planiranje radne snage i plasman u kasnijem delu sezone.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Sorta se odlikuje uspravnim rastom, pogodna je za intenzivne zasade i mehanizovanu berbu. Dobro podnosi rezidbu, ima visoku otpornost na američku pepelnicu i druge bolesti. Prilagođena je različitim klimatskim uslovima i uspešno se gaji u većini proizvodnih regiona Evrope.

subvarietys.about: Triton je poznata sorta crne ribizle poreklom iz Skandinavije, cenjena zbog visoke otpornosti na mraz i bolesti, kao i zbog dobrog prinosa i kvaliteta plodova. Namenjena je prvenstveno za industrijsku preradu, ali se zbog uravnoteženog ukusa i prijatne arome koristi i za svežu potrošnju. Pogodna je za uzgoj u različitim klimatskim uslovima, uključujući i one sa kraćom vegetacijom.

characteristics.title: Plodovi i ukus:
characteristics.text: Bobice su krupne, tamnoljubičaste do crne boje, sa čvrstom pokožicom i izraženim, tipičnim ukusom crne ribizle. Pogodne su za različite vidove prerade – posebno za proizvodnju sokova, sirupa i voćnih namaza zbog visokog sadržaja suve materije i intenzivne arome.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva sredinom jula, što je svrstava u grupe srednje ranih do srednje kasnih sorti. Grozdovi su srednje dugi, a plodovi sazrevaju ujednačeno, što omogućava efikasnu berbu, ručno ili mehanizovano.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Sorta je snažnog rasta, pogodna za uzgoj u različitim sistemima. Dobro uspeva na vlažnijim i hladnijim terenima, a otpornost na zimske mrazeve je među najvišima među ribizlama. Traži umereno plodna i dobro drenirana zemljišta. Redovna rezidba podstiče visoke i stabilne prinose.

subvarietys.about: Titana je sorta crne ribizle poreklom iz Poljske, razvijena s ciljem postizanja visokih prinosa, otpornosti na bolesti i odličnog kvaliteta plodova. Zbog srednje kasnog sazrevanja i ujednačenog dozrevanja, pogodna je za mehanizovanu berbu, što je čini atraktivnom za profesionalne zasade. Plodovi su krupni, aromatični i bogati vitaminom C, što je čini veoma traženom u preradi i industrijskoj upotrebi.

characteristics.title: Plodovi i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su veliki, tamnoplavi do crni, sa sjajnom pokožicom i prijatnim, osvežavajućim ukusom. Grozdovi su srednje dugi do dugi, sa ravnomernim rasporedom bobica. Aroma je izražena, tipična za crnu ribizlu, a sadržaj korisnih sastojaka čini je odličnom sirovinom za preradu.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva sredinom do kraja jula, ravnomerno i bez velikog opadanja plodova, što omogućava organizovanu i efikasnu berbu – kako ručnu, tako i mehaničku.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Sorta pokazuje dobru otpornost na bolesti lišća i plodova, naročito na američku pepelnicu. Snažan porast i dobra razgranatost grma omogućavaju laku negu i održavanje zasada. Najbolje rezultate daje na plodnim, dobro dreniranim zemljištima, uz redovno orezivanje radi podmlađivanja izdanaka.

subvarietys.about: Čačanska bestrna je domaća, izuzetno cenjena sorta kupine bez bodlji, razvijena na Institutu za voćarstvo u Čačku. Ističe se visokom rodnošću, krupnim plodovima i izuzetnim osobinama za svežu potrošnju i preradu. Njena otpornost, jednostavna berba i odličan ukus čine je idealnim izborom za komercijalne zasade i porodična gazdinstva.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su veliki do vrlo veliki, valjkastog oblika, sjajne tamnoljubičaste do crne boje. Meso je sočno, srednje čvrsto, slatko-kiselog i prijatno osvežavajućeg ukusa. Pogodna je za svežu potrošnju, ali i za zamrzavanje, preradu u sokove, džemove i vino.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Počinje da sazreva krajem jula i traje do kraja avgusta, u zavisnosti od vremenskih uslova. Daje plodove postepeno, što omogućava produženu berbu.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Dobro uspeva na plodnim, dobro dreniranima zemljištima uz dovoljno sunčeve svetlosti. Zahteva redovno zalivanje i podešenu rezidbu za održavanje rodnosti i forme žbuna. Nema bodlji, pa je idealna za plantažnu proizvodnju i ručnu berbu.

subvarietys.about: Loch Ness je poznata beztrnova sorta kupine poreklom iz Škotske, cenjena zbog visokog prinosa, odlične otpornosti i izuzetnog kvaliteta ploda. Plodovi su krupni, sjajni i izuzetno ukusni, što ovu sortu čini idealnom kako za svežu potrošnju, tako i za preradu. Zbog svoje prilagođenosti različitim uslovima i jednostavnog održavanja, omiljena je među profesionalnim i hobi uzgajivačima.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su veliki, čvrsti, sjajni i tamno crni. Imaju prijatan slatko-kiselkast ukus i bogatu aromu, što ih čini pogodnim za konzumaciju u svežem stanju, ali i za sokove, džemove, likere i druge prerađevine.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva sredinom do kraja jula i plodonosi tokom avgusta. Ima produžen period berbe koji omogućava stabilnu distribuciju svežih plodova.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje rezultate daje na plodnim, umereno vlažnim i dobro dreniranima zemljištima. Zahteva redovno orezivanje radi očuvanja zdravih izdanaka i bogatog roda.

subvarietys.about: Thornfree je američka sorta kupine bez trnja, poznata po velikim, mesnatim plodovima i izuzetnoj rodnosti. Zbog kasnijeg sazrevanja, često se koristi za produžetak sezone berbe. Nudi dobar balans između ukusa, otpornosti i prinosnosti, što je čini pogodnom za komercijalnu i amatersku proizvodnju.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su veliki, sjajni i tamni. Meso je čvrsto, sočno, blago kiselkastog ukusa, sa blagom aromom. Pogodni su za svežu upotrebu, ali i za džemove, sokove, zamrzavanje i druge vrste prerade.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Kasna sorta – sazreva od sredine avgusta i često donosi rod sve do kraja leta. Idealna za produženje sezone kupina.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na plodnim i dobro dreniranima zemljištima, uz dobru osvetljenost. Preporučuje se redovno orezivanje i održavanje zasada zbog jakog rasta.

subvarietys.about: Triple Crown je američka sorta kupine bez trnja, cenjena zbog izuzetno slatkog ukusa, krupnih plodova i duge berbe. Ime "Triple Crown" (trostruka kruna) ukazuje na njene glavne prednosti: slatkoću, prinos i snagu rasta. Ova sorta je odličan izbor za svežu potrošnju, ali i za razne oblike prerade.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su veliki do vrlo veliki, tamnoljubičasto-crni, sa sjajnom pokožicom. Meso je sočno, aromatično i izrazito slatko, bez jake kiselosti. Idealni su za direktnu konzumaciju, ali i za kolače, sokove i džemove.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Berba počinje krajem jula i može trajati sve do početka septembra, što je čini sortom sa jednom od najdužih sezona zrenja među kupinama.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje rezultate daje na plodnim, sunčanim i propusnim zemljištima. Zbog bujnog rasta preporučuje se redovno rezanje i pravilno formiranje žbunova.

subvarietys.about: Meeker je jedna od najpoznatijih i najrasprostranjenijih letnjih sorti maline, poreklom iz SAD. Cenjena je zbog visokog prinosa, krupnih plodova, kao i odličnog balansa između slatkoće i kiselosti. Pogodna je za svežu potrošnju, zamrzavanje, kao i za industrijsku preradu, posebno u proizvodnji sokova i džemova. Umerenih zahteva prema uslovima gajenja, pouzdano rađa i u planinskim područjima.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su veliki,  jarko crvene boje i ujednačeni. Meso je sočno, blago zrnasto, sa izraženom malinskom aromom. Ukus je slatko-kiselkast, veoma osvežavajući. Pogodna je za konzumaciju u svežem stanju, ali i za dugotrajno zamrzavanje bez gubitka kvaliteta.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva sredinom juna i bere se tokom 3–4 nedelje. Plodovi se lako odvajaju od peteljke, što olakšava berbu, kako ručnu, tako i mehanizovanu.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje rezultate daje na blago kiselim, plodnim, dobro dreniranim  zemljištima. Preferira umerenu klimu, ali podnosi i nešto niže temperature. Potrebna joj je dobra sunčana ekspozicija i provetravanje, zbog osetljivosti na truljenje u vlažnim uslovima.

subvarietys.about: Willamette je stara, ali i dalje vrlo popularna letnja sorta maline, poreklom iz američke savezne države Oregon. Poznata je po ranom sazrevanju, visokom prinosu i intenzivnoj aromi plodova. Veoma je cenjena u industrijskoj preradi, ali i za svežu potrošnju. Zahvalna je za gajenje, podnosi razne uslove i pogodna je za uzgoj u kontinentalnim i planinskim područjima.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su srednje krupni do krupni, tamno crvene boje, čvrsti, blago pupčastog oblika. Meso je sočno, sa izraženim slatko-kiselkastim ukusom i bogatom aromom. Zbog sadržaja boje i ukusa, često se koristi u industrijskoj preradi – posebno za džemove i sokove.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva veoma rano, često početkom ili sredinom juna, i traje oko 2–3 nedelje. Plod se lako odvaja od peteljke, što olakšava ručnu berbu.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Uspeva na različitim tipovima zemljišta, ali preferira plodna, dobro drenirana zemljišta, blago kisele reakcije. Potrebna joj je dobra osvetljenost, a zbog bujnog rasta preporučuje se redovno orezivanje radi boljeg provetravanja i zdravlja zasada.

subvarietys.about: Ajdared is an American apple variety created by crossing the Jonathan and Wagner varieties. Due to its attractive appearance, resilience, and long shelf life, it is very popular both in commercial production and among consumers. It belongs to the group of winter varieties and is known for its stable and high yield.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: The fruit is medium to large in size, with a smooth and shiny skin. The color is predominantly red with a greenish base. It is suitable for consumers who enjoy a balance between sweetness and tartness.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: Ajdared ripens in late September or early October.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: It thrives best in fertile, deep, and loose soil with good drainage. Slightly acidic to neutral soils are optimal, and it grows best in sunny and moderately moist plots.

subvarietys.about: Breburn originates from New Zealand and is one of the most important apple varieties in commercial production due to its durability, fruit quality, and balanced flavor. It is the result of a natural cross between Lady Hamilton and Granny Smith. It is recognized for its firm structure, sweet-tart taste, and long shelf life.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: The fruit is firm and large, with a smooth skin in reddish tones. What sets this variety apart is its juicy and pleasantly refreshing, mildly tart flavor.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: Breburn is harvested in the second half of October, making it a late-season variety. It is known for excellent transportability and firmness, making it suitable for extended market availability.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: It thrives best in well-drained, fertile soil with good sun exposure.

subvarietys.about: Fuji is a highly valued apple variety from Japan, developed by crossing Ralls Janet and Red Delicious. In commercial production, it is known for its consistent fruit quality, storage resilience, and long shelf life without losing freshness. Fuji is one of the most in-demand varieties on the global market, especially in the fresh consumption segment.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: The fruit is large, firm, and juicy. The skin is yellowish-green, almost completely covered with red-pink shades. The flavor is distinctly sweet, with almost no acidity and a mild aroma.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: Fuji is harvested in the second half of October. It belongs to late-season varieties but is known for its excellent durability and long-lasting freshness in storage.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: It thrives best in deep, fertile, and well-drained soils. It requires warm, sunny locations and regular irrigation to achieve full fruit quality.

subvarietys.about: Gala is a very popular apple variety originating from New Zealand, known for its exceptional sweetness and pleasant aromas. Due to its color and consistent fruit quality, it is widely used in commercial production, and its fruits are among the most in-demand on the market.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: The fruits are small to medium-sized, with smooth, thin skin that is yellow-red, often with golden hues. This variety is very sweet, with mild and pleasant fruity aromas.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: Gala is an early variety, harvested as early as the first half of August.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: Gala thrives best in fertile, well-drained soils with ample sunlight exposure.

subvarietys.about: Gloster is an apple variety originating from Germany, known for its firm texture and excellent storage resistance. Gloster fruits are often larger, with a distinctive red, almost black color, making them very recognizable. This variety is valued for its versatility, being used for fresh consumption as well as for making juices, jams, and brandies.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: The fruit is medium to large in size, with dark red, sometimes nearly black skin. The mildly tart flavor gives a refreshing note. Consistency in taste and texture makes this variety suitable for long-term storage.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: Gloster is harvested at the end of September and beginning of October.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: This variety thrives best in fertile, well-drained soils with sufficient sunlight. For optimal growth, Gloster requires a balanced moisture level and not too much soil acidity.

subvarietys.about: Granny Smith is an Australian apple variety known for its vivid green color and distinctly tart flavor. This variety is very recognizable and widely used due to its firm texture and fresh, refreshing taste. It is ideal for all types of culinary uses and is also used in juice and brandy production.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: The fruit is medium-sized with characteristic light green skin. The flavor is strongly tart and refreshing, with very little sweetness. This combination provides a unique profile, perfect for fans of more acidic apples.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: Granny Smith is harvested in October and November.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: This variety grows best in deep, fertile, well-drained soils, with regular irrigation.

subvarietys.about: Jonagold is a hybrid apple variety created by crossing Jonathan and Golden Delicious. It is recognized by its golden-red appearance, rich flavor, and versatile use. This variety is highly valued in the fruit-growing industry for its high-quality texture and refreshing sweet-tart taste.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: Jonagold fruits are medium to large, with smooth skin ranging from light yellow to reddish. The dominant flavor is a balanced sweet-tart taste. Its distinctive fruity aroma makes it very pleasant to consume.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: Jonagold is harvested from the second half of September to early October, depending on the region. Thanks to its durability, the fruits can be stored for a long time without losing quality.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: Jonagold thrives best in fertile, well-drained soils with optimal moisture and sunlight. The soil should be rich in nutrients, with regular irrigation during dry periods.

subvarietys.about: Red Spur Delicious is a variant of the popular Delicious variety, known for its intense red appearance and sweet taste. This variety is recognizable for its attractive red color and is ideal for fresh consumption. It is valued for its firm texture and high fruit quality, making it one of the favorite market choices.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: Red Spur Delicious apples are medium to large in size, with smooth, bright red skin that is highly appealing and evenly colored. It is characterized by natural sweetness and a mild, refreshing flavor. This combination of taste and texture makes it a perfect choice for fresh eating.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: This variety is harvested in mid-September. The fruits ripen quickly and are ready for market by late summer and early autumn.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: Red Spur Delicious requires fertile soil with good drainage and regular irrigation. The soil should be rich in nutrients to ensure healthy growth and high-quality fruit.

subvarietys.about: Summer Red is an early apple variety known for its beautiful red color and refreshing taste. With its mild sweet-tart combination, it is ideal for fresh consumption during the summer. The fruits of this variety ripen quickly, making it one of the first apples to hit the market, which makes it especially popular in the summer season.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: Summer Red fruits are medium-sized, with smooth, bright red skin. They offer a refreshing, well-balanced sweet-tart flavor that provides a pleasant taste.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: The variety is harvested early in the summer, typically in June and July, making it the first summer apple on the market.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: Summer Red thrives best in fertile, well-drained soil with ample sunlight. It requires regular irrigation during dry periods to achieve optimal fruit quality.

subvarietys.about: Top Red is an apple variety known for its exceptional red color and sweet, refreshing flavor. This hybrid variety originates from the popular Delicious apple but features an even deeper red color and excellent taste. It is ideal for the fresh consumption market as well as for juice and jam production. Top Red is valued for its juicy texture and visual appeal, making it one of the most popular consumer choices.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: Top Red apples are medium to large in size, with smooth, intensely red skin. They have a sweet, refreshing taste that is well-balanced and pleasant. This variety is highly attractive due to its color and appearance.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: Top Red is harvested from mid to late September.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: Top Red prefers fertile, well-drained soil. To achieve high fruit quality, regular irrigation and adequate sun exposure during the growing season are essential.

subvarietys.about: Golden Delicious is one of the most well-known apple varieties, characterized by its light golden-yellow color and mild, sweet taste. This is a mid- to late-season variety valued for its storage durability and broad usage. It is ideal for fresh consumption as well as for juice and jam production. Golden Delicious is also extremely popular among consumers due to its tender texture and juiciness.

characteristics.title: Appearance and taste:
characteristics.text: Golden Delicious apples are medium to large in size, with smooth, golden-yellow skin that may occasionally feature slight reddish hues. This variety is sweet and juicy, with mild fruity aromas that make it very pleasant for consumption.

characteristics.title: Harvest season:
characteristics.text: Golden Delicious ripens in mid-October, when the fruit reaches full maturity.

characteristics.title: Suitable soil:
characteristics.text: For optimal growth, Golden Delicious requires fertile, well-drained soil. The best results are achieved in nutrient-rich soils with regular irrigation.

subvarietys.about: Čačanska lepotica is a domestic summer plum variety developed at the Fruit Research Institute in Čačak. Known for its large, dark purple fruit and early, reliable yields. Thanks to its balanced sweetness and mild acidity, it is excellent for fresh consumption, drying, and brandy production.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Fruit weighs 35-40g, elliptical shape. Skin is dark purple with a bluish bloom. Flesh is yellow-green, firm, juicy, with a pleasant sweet-tart flavor. Stone separates easily.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens very early – usually between July 25th and August 5th. Fruits ripen simultaneously, allowing for a single harvest.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Performs best on deep, medium-heavy, moderately moist, and well-drained soils with a pH of 6.0–7.0. Full sun exposure is essential for rich color and sugar content.

subvarietys.about: Čačanska najbolja is a highly valued Serbian plum variety, created by crossing Wangenheim and Požegača. It is a mid-season variety, known for its excellent adaptability, consistent yield, and superior fruit quality, making it widely used for brandy and processing.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Fruits weigh 30-35g, elliptical shape. Skin is dark blue with a waxy coating. Flesh is yellow-green, firm, very juicy, and sweet. Stone separates easily.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens in mid-August. The crop ripens uniformly, allowing for one or two harvests.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Performs well on a wide range of soils – from lighter alluvial to medium-heavy clay – provided they are well-drained. Optimal pH 6.0–7.2. Tolerates mild droughts but gives the best yields with irrigation.

subvarietys.about: Čačanska rana is the earliest plum from the Čačak selection, created by crossing Stanley and Požegača. It produces ripe fruits as early as early July, marking the start of the plum season. The variety is appreciated for its early yield, attractive fruit appearance, and versatile use.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Fruit weighs 25–30g, elliptical shape. Skin is dark red-blue with a waxy bloom. Flesh is yellow, medium firm, juicy, and sweet-tart. Stone separates relatively easily.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens very early – in the first ten days of July. Due to rapid ripening, prompt harvest and quick distribution are recommended.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Performs best on deep, fertile, slightly acidic to neutral soils with good drainage and plenty of sunlight. For high yields in dry years, irrigation is recommended.

subvarietys.about: Čačanska rodna, created by crossing Stanley and Požegača, is one of the most reliable and productive Serbian plum varieties. It is a mid-season variety, known for its exceptional and consistent yield, larger fruits, and high dry matter content, making it a top-quality raw material for drying and brandy production.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Fruit weighs 35-40g, elliptical shape. Skin is dark blue with abundant waxy bloom. Flesh is yellow-green to yellow, firm, moderately juicy, pleasantly sweet. Stone separates easily.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens in the first ten days of August. Uniform ripening allows for a single harvest.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Performs best on deep, fertile, well-drained soils. Can tolerate modest conditions, but regular irrigation and fertilization are recommended for top yields.

subvarietys.about: An old Italian plum variety, valued in local orchards for its very large fruit and pleasant, aromatic flesh. Traditionally grown for fresh use, drying, and homemade brandy.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Fruits can reach up to 45g. Skin is dark purple with a waxy bloom, sometimes speckled with lighter spots. Flesh is yellow-green, firm, juicy, and pleasantly sweet. Stone separates semi-freely.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Typically ripens in mid-August in continental areas of central Italy. In warmer climates, a few days earlier.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Gives the best yields on deep, medium-heavy loamy soils with a pH of 6.2–7.2. Requires full sun. Tolerates mild droughts, but drip irrigation is recommended for top yields.

subvarietys.about: President is a well-known English plum variety characterized by very large fruits, uniform ripening, and excellent storage potential. It is a late variety that extends the fresh plum season. With its firm flesh and high dry matter content, it is valued for fresh consumption, freezing, drying, and high-quality brandy.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Fruit is oval to elliptical. Skin is dark purple with a noticeable waxy coating. Flesh is yellow-green, firm, juicy, with a sweet-tart flavor. Stone separates easily.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens in mid to late September. Thanks to its firmness, it tolerates delayed harvest, and can be stored in cold storage for 4–6 weeks.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Performs best on deep, moderately moist, well-drained loamy soils (pH 6.2–7.2). Requires full sun. In dry years, irrigation is recommended for maximum fruit size.

subvarietys.about: Stanley is an American mid-late plum variety that has become globally widespread due to its reliable yield, large fruit, and versatile use. In Serbia, it is the standard for processing, drying, and brandy. It produces consistent yields, tolerates transport well, and is highly adaptable to various climates.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Skin is dark blue with a dense waxy coating. Flesh is yellow-green, firm, juicy, and pleasantly sweet. Stone separates easily – important for industrial processing.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens from August 25th to September 5th (depending on location). Fruits ripen uniformly, allowing for a single main harvest.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Stanley grows well on most fertile, moderately moist soils with a pH of 6.0–7.2. For top yields, it needs full sun and irrigation during dry periods. Sensitive to heavy, poorly drained soils.

subvarietys.about: Heimann’s Processing Cherry is a well-known industrial variety of sour cherry of Austrian origin, selected in the late 19th century at the Heimann nursery. It is valued for its high yield, stable acidity, and dark red juice, making it ideal for juice production, jams, compotes, and the confectionery industry. Varieties of this type remain a standard in professional orchards intended for mechanized harvesting and processing.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: The fruits are round, with a dark red to almost black skin when fully ripe. The juice is intensely red, rich in pigments and acids (pH ≈ 3.3). The flesh is soft, juicy, and distinctly tart, making this variety ideal for producing concentrates, jams, and cherry liqueurs.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens mid-late: from the last ten days of June to the first week of July in most continental regions. The fruits ripen uniformly, allowing for single-pass mechanized harvesting.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Thrives best in moderately fertile, well-drained loamy and alluvial soils with a pH of 6.0–7.0. Tolerates slightly calcareous soils and achieves optimal yields in full sun exposure with regular irrigation during dry periods.

subvarietys.about: Kelleris 14 is a Danish sour cherry variety developed at the Statens Planteavlsforsøg Institute. It belongs to the group of late-ripening sour cherries and is highly valued in the industry for its high yield, dark red, aromatic juice, and firm flesh that withstands freezing well. The variety is suitable for mechanized harvesting and is recommended for commercial orchards intended for processing.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste
characteristics.text: The fruits are dark red and shiny. The skin is firm, and the flesh is light red, juicy, and firmer than most cherries. The juice is dark red, rich in anthocyanins, distinctly tart, and pleasantly aromatic—excellent for processing and the confectionery industry.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season
characteristics.text: Ripens late, typically in the second half of July. Ripening is uniform, enabling single-pass harvesting with mechanical shakers.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil
characteristics.text: Achieves the best results on deep, fertile, well-drained loamy soils with a pH of 6.0–7.2. Tolerates colder winters and more humid climates but requires full sun exposure for maximum sugar and color content.

subvarietys.about: Kelleris 16 is a Danish industrial sour cherry variety, selected at the Kelleriis Research Station through crossing Stevnsbær and Schmidt varieties. It is particularly valued for its very high yield, resistance to fruit cracking, and uniform ripening, which allows for efficient mechanized harvesting. The dark red juice, rich in pigments, is ideal for processing into concentrates, jams, and frozen fruit.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste
characteristics.text: Medium-sized fruits with dark red skin and meaty texture. The juice is intensely colored, rich in anthocyanins and acids, with a pleasant aroma typical of the Danish sour cherry group.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season
characteristics.text: Ripens mid-late, usually in the second half of July. The fruits ripen uniformly, enabling single-pass mechanized harvesting.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil
characteristics.text: Thrives in deep, fertile, slightly acidic to neutral soils (pH 6.0–7.0). It tolerates colder Scandinavian-type climates as well as continental conditions, provided there is good drainage.

subvarietys.about: Montmorency is the most widespread American sour cherry variety and the global industrial standard for processing. Originally from France, it has been widely cultivated in the US and Canada since the 19th century due to its exceptionally high yield, stable acidity, and suitable consistency for freezing, juices, and pies.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste
characteristics.text: Medium-sized fruits with shiny bright red skin. The flesh is light red, firm, and juicy. The juice is clear, distinctly acidic (pH ≈ 3.2) – ideal for juices, concentrates, pies, and jams.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season
characteristics.text: Ripens mid-early to mid-late, typically in late June and early July in continental climates. Ripening is quite uniform, allowing for single-pass shaking.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil
characteristics.text: Gives the best results on deep, moderate, and well-drained clay-loam soils with a pH of 6.0–7.2. Requires full sun exposure for high dry matter content. Tolerates colder winters and mild droughts with irrigation.

subvarietys.about: Oblačinska is an indigenous Serbian sour cherry variety that forms the backbone of industrial production in the Balkans. Known for its small, dark red fruits rich in dry matter, high acidity, and exceptional aroma, it is considered the gold standard for concentrate, jam, compote, and especially for traditional cherry liqueurs. The variety is self-pollinating, highly productive, and well-adapted to various agro-ecological conditions.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste
characteristics.text: Fruits are small, dark red to almost black. The flesh is soft, very juicy, distinctly tart, and aromatic. The juice is rich in anthocyanins, deeply colored, and ideal for processing.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season
characteristics.text: Ripens mid-early, typically between late June and early July in most continental areas. Fruits ripen gradually, and due to their high acidity, they do not overripe quickly, allowing for a more flexible harvesting window.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil
characteristics.text: Oblačinska thrives on a wide range of soils – from poorer sandy soils to medium-heavy clay – as long as they are well-drained. It is tolerant of lower rainfall and temperature extremes, making it suitable for extensive and organic orchards.

subvarietys.about: Šumadinka is a modern Serbian sour cherry variety, developed through selection at the Fruit Research Institute in Čačak. Primarily intended for industrial processing, it is also attractive for fresh use due to its larger fruit, firmer flesh, and balanced sugar-acid ratio. The variety is self-pollinating, reliably productive, and adapted to mechanized harvesting, making it an excellent choice for intensive orchards.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste
characteristics.text: Fruits are rounded in shape. The skin is dark red and shiny. The flesh is firm, juicy, with a fine sweet-tart balance. The juice is intensely red and aromatic.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season
characteristics.text: Ripens in the mid-season for sour cherries, typically the first week of July. Fruits ripen uniformly, allowing for single-pass mechanical shaking or quick handpicking.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil
characteristics.text: Performs best on deep, medium-heavy, well-drained soils with a pH of 6.0–7.0. Tolerates mild droughts and winter frosts. For top yields, full sun exposure and occasional irrigation during dry periods are recommended.

subvarietys.about: Bing is one of the most famous sweet cherry varieties, prized for its attractive appearance and exceptionally juicy, sweet taste. Originating from the United States, it is widely cultivated for its high yields and superior fruit quality. It is ideal for fresh consumption but also used for processing into jams and juices. The fruits are large, glossy, dark red, and have a characteristic aromatic flavor.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Bing cherries are medium to large in size, with smooth, dark red skin that can become almost black when fully ripe. The flesh is juicy, crisp, very sweet, and aromatic, with mild tart notes that make it highly enjoyable to eat.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Bing ripens in mid-July, making it one of the earliest market-ready sweet cherry varieties. It is also valued for its storage durability, maintaining quality during transport and at market.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: For optimal growth, Bing requires fertile, well-drained soils. It also tolerates sunny conditions well, making it ideal for regions with warmer climates. Regular irrigation is recommended for the best results.

subvarietys.about: Bigarreau Burlat is one of the earliest sweet cherry varieties, valued for its high quality, large fruits, and sweet taste. Originating from France, it is one of the most important global commercial cherry varieties. The fruits are bright red, firm, and juicy, with a rich, sweet flavor. Bigarreau Burlat is popular for its resilience and excellent market traits, making it ideal for fresh consumption and processing.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Bigarreau Burlat cherries are large, bright red, with smooth, glossy skin. The flesh is juicy, firm, and sweet, with subtle fruity aromas. This variety is known for its distinctive sweet taste and crisp texture.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Bigarreau Burlat ripens very early, typically by early June. This variety is popular for its early ripening and ability to reach the market before many other sweet cherry varieties.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: For optimal growth, Bigarreau Burlat requires fertile, well-drained soils. It prefers sunny locations, and regular irrigation supports better fruit development.

subvarietys.about: Early Lyons, also known as Lionska Rana, is an early sweet cherry variety with large, red fruits and a rich, sweet-tart flavor. This variety is ideal for the market as it ripens among the first cherries of the season. Early Lyons is known for its earliness, stable yield, and disease resistance, making it suitable for organic cultivation. Due to its attractive appearance and excellent taste profile, it is often used for fresh consumption and processing.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Early Lyons cherries are medium to large, bright red, with smooth, glossy skin. The flesh is juicy, firm, and has a mild sweet-tart flavor that is pleasant and refreshing. This variety is known for its aromatic taste, which satisfies even the most demanding consumers.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Early Lyons is a very early variety, ripening as early as the beginning of June, making it highly sought after in the cherry market. It is ideal for those seeking an early harvest and early-season access to fresh cherries.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: For optimal growth, Early Lyons prefers fertile, well-drained soils. It performs best in sunny locations, with regular irrigation contributing to larger, higher-quality fruits.

subvarietys.about: Ferrovia is a mid-late sweet cherry variety known for its large, dark red fruits and excellent quality. This variety is valued for its disease resistance, high yields, and good transportability, making it ideal for the market. Ferrovia cherries are juicy, with a rich sweet-tart flavor, making them perfect for fresh consumption and processing. The variety is suitable for diverse climates and soil types, making it a popular choice among cherry growers.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Ferrovia cherries are large, dark red, with smooth, firm skin. The flesh is juicy, crisp, and very flavorful, with a mild, balanced sweet-tart taste that is highly enjoyable.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ferrovia ripens in mid-July, making it a mid-late variety. The fruits reach full maturity when cherry demand is still high, offering optimal market timing.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: This variety prefers fertile, well-drained soils. It performs best in sunny areas with regular irrigation, ensuring high fruit quality and stable yields.

subvarietys.about: Grosse Germersdorfer is a well-known late-season sweet cherry variety from Germany, prized for its exceptionally large, dark red fruits. The fruits have firm flesh, a rich and full flavor, and the variety is particularly popular for its extended harvest period and good post-harvest storage. It is suitable for commercial production and direct sale, thanks to its attractive appearance and high market value.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: The fruits are exceptionally large, heart-shaped, dark red with a glossy skin. The flesh is firm, crisp, and rich in aroma, making the variety highly appealing for fresh consumption.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Grosse Germersdorfer is harvested at the end of June or early July, as one of the last varieties of the season. The extended harvest period allows flexibility in marketing and sales.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: The variety thrives best in warm, sunny locations with well-drained, fertile soil. Moderate irrigation and protection from spring frosts are recommended due to its late flowering.

subvarietys.about: Hedelfingen is an old and well-regarded German sweet cherry variety, known for its reliability, resilience, and high-quality fruits. With large, dark red fruits and firm, juicy flesh, it is often used for both fresh consumption and processing. The variety is suitable for commercial orchards due to its stable yield and good transportability.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: The fruits are large, dark red, and shiny. The flesh is firm, juicy, and pleasantly mildly sweet. The stone separates easily, making it convenient for consumption and processing.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Hedelfingen ripens at the end of June or early July, as a late variety. The extended harvest period makes it suitable for marketing under different weather conditions.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: It thrives best in deep, moderately fertile, and well-drained soils. Requires sunny locations and moderate moisture.

subvarietys.about: Kordia is a high-quality Czech sweet cherry variety, known for its large, dark red fruits of exceptional flavor and firmness. It is considered one of the most prized varieties on the fresh fruit market due to its attractive appearance and long shelf life. It is ideal for commercial orchards as it combines aesthetics, resilience, and excellent market value.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: The fruits are very large, heart-shaped, and dark red to almost black. The flesh is firm, juicy, and highly aromatic, with a balanced sweet and tart flavor.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens at the end of June to early July. The late harvest allows for good market availability when other varieties have already finished their season.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Performs best on fertile, medium-light, and well-drained soils, with full sun exposure essential. Recommended for orchards in temperate and warmer regions.

subvarietys.about: Regina is a German late sweet cherry variety, known for its large, dark red fruits and excellent resistance to cracking. Highly valued in commercial production, especially in regions with higher rainfall. Its firmness and rich flavor make it a great choice for fresh consumption and transport.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: The fruits are large, attractive, with firm skin and pronounced aroma. The flesh is dark, firm, and very juicy, with a pleasant balance of sweetness and tartness.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Regina ripens in the last ten days of June to early July, making it ideal for extending the cherry harvest season.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Performs best in fertile, well-drained soils. Recommended for regions with higher rainfall as it is resistant to fruit cracking.

subvarietys.about: Sunburst je moderna, samoplodna sorta trešnje poreklom iz Kanade. Poznata je po krupnim, tamnocrvenim plodovima i izuzetnoj otpornosti na pucanje plodova. Zahvaljujući bogatom ukusu i jednostavnom uzgoju, sve češće se bira za plantažnu i amatersku proizvodnju. Idealna je za svežu konzumaciju, ali i za kraće skladištenje i lokalnu prodaju.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su krupni do vrlo krupni, sjajne tamnocrvene boje, sa čvrstim, sočnim i vrlo slatkim mesom. Koštica se lako odvaja.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva u drugoj polovini juna. Berba se može obavljati u nekoliko navrata zbog ujednačenog sazrevanja.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na dubokim, plodnim i propusnim zemljištima, na sunčanim i dobro provetrenim položajima. Prilagođena različitim klimatskim uslovima.

subvarietys.about: Summit je kanadska sorta trešnje koja se odlikuje krupnim, srcolikim plodovima i izuzetnim ukusom. Iako delimično samoplodna, daje najbolje rezultate u kombinaciji sa oprašivačima. Zbog visokog prinosa i otpornosti na pucanje plodova, često se gaji i u komercijalnim zasadima. Cenjena je i zbog atraktivnog izgleda i dobre transportabilnosti.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su krupni, crvene do tamnocrvene boje, sa čvrstim, sočnim mesom prijatnog, osvežavajućeg ukusa. Srcolikog oblika i vrlo atraktivni za tržište.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva krajem juna, neposredno posle sorti srednje rane epohe. Pogodna za mehanizovanu i ručnu berbu.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje rezultate daje na osunčanim i umereno plodnim zemljištima, sa dobrom drenažom. Zahteva redovno navodnjavanje za pun rod.

subvarietys.about: Starking Hardy Giant je američka kasna sorta trešnje poznata po izuzetno krupnim plodovima i čvrstoj, hrskavoj teksturi. Zahvaljujući svom atraktivnom izgledu i izvrsnom ukusu, veoma je tražena na tržištu svežeg voća. Sorta je otporna na niske temperature i pogodna za gajenje u različitim klimatskim uslovima.

characteristics.title: Izgled i ukus:
characteristics.text: Plodovi su vrlo krupni, tamnocrvene do gotovo crne boje u punoj zrelosti. Meso je čvrsto, sočno, osvežavajuće, idealno za svežu upotrebu.

characteristics.title: Sezona berbe:
characteristics.text: Sazreva početkom jula, spada u kasnije sorte trešanja. Prikladna za profesionalne zasade zbog visokog prinosa.

characteristics.title: Pogodno zemljište:
characteristics.text: Najbolje uspeva na dobro dreniranom, umereno plodnom zemljištu. Dobro podnosi kontintentalne uslove, posebno niske zimske temperature.

subvarietys.about: Hungary Best is a mid-early apricot variety originating from Hungary, very popular for its resistance and stable yield. The fruits are large, with an attractive orange color and reddish blushes. The flesh is firm, juicy, and has a sweet-tart taste. This variety performs excellently for both fresh consumption and industrial processing.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: The fruits are large and oval-shaped, with smooth orange skin that often has a reddish blush on the sunny side. The flesh is firm, fine-textured, juicy, and has a pleasant sweet-tart taste, suitable for both fresh use and processing.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Hungary Best ripens in mid-July. It belongs to the group of mid-early apricots and ensures stable yields even in less favorable years.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Performs best on warm, sunny sites with moderately fertile, well-drained soil. It does not tolerate waterlogging, so planting on slightly elevated areas is recommended.

subvarietys.about: Kečkemetska ruža is an early Hungarian apricot variety, known for its decorative appearance and refreshing taste. Thanks to its beautiful pinkish-orange color and pronounced aroma, it is often used for both fresh consumption and processing. This variety is valued by growers for its early ripening, good yield, and market appeal.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: The fruit is medium-large, oval in shape. The skin is orange with soft pinkish hues, smooth and thin. The flesh is light yellow, firm, very juicy, and aromatic, with a slight tart refreshment – excellent for fresh use and processing.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens at the end of June or the beginning of July. Belongs to the early apricot varieties, offering early market availability.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Prefers sunny sites with light, loose, and fertile soils that have good drainage. Does not tolerate waterlogging or overly wet soils.

subvarietys.about: New Jersey 19 is an American apricot variety known for its large, attractive fruits and excellent balance between sweetness and mild acidity. It is valued for its stable and early yields as well as good commercial potential. Suitable for both fresh consumption and processing.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Fruits are large, slightly oval, with orange skin and a subtle blush on the sunny side. The flesh is firm, juicy, and aromatic, with a pleasant, refreshing flavor.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens at the end of June, classified among early varieties.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Thrives best on sunny sites with well-drained, moderately fertile soils. It does not tolerate overly wet or compacted soils.

subvarietys.about: Novosadska rodna is a domestic apricot variety developed in Novi Sad, known for its consistent and abundant yields. It is highly valued among growers for its good disease resistance, uniform fruits, and suitability for industrial processing. Well-adapted to local conditions, it is a reliable choice for continental regions.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Fruits are medium-large, round to slightly oval, with orange skin and a slight blush. Flesh is light orange, juicy, medium firm, with a pleasant, mildly sweet taste.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens at the end of June to early July, classified among mid-early apricot varieties.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: Performs best on deep, loose, and well-drained soils with good sun exposure. Tolerates moderately continental conditions well.

subvarietys.about: NS 4 is a domestic apricot variety known for its exceptional yields and good disease resistance. Developed at the Fruit Research Institute in Novi Sad, it is highly valued for its adaptability and excellent characteristics for commercial production. NS 4 produces high-quality fruits suitable for both fresh consumption and industrial processing.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Fruits are large, oval, light orange with a slight blush. The flesh is juicy, firm, moderately fibrous, and has a rich, sweet flavor.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens in mid-June, making it a mid-early apricot variety.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: NS 4 thrives on deep, loose soils with good drainage. It also tolerates drier conditions, making it suitable for regions with lower rainfall.

subvarietys.about: NS 6 is a domestic apricot variety known for its exceptional yields and resistance to adverse weather conditions. Developed at the Fruit Research Institute in Novi Sad, it is highly valued for its high-quality fruit and excellent adaptability to various soil types. Ideal for commercial production and industrial processing, as it stores and maintains quality well during transport.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Fruits are medium-large to large, with smooth, light orange skin. The flesh is juicy, firm, and aromatic, with a sweet, pleasant taste.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: Ripens in mid-June, classified as a mid-early apricot variety.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: NS 6 performs best on fertile, well-drained soils. The variety is drought-tolerant, but optimal growth is ensured with regular irrigation.

subvarietys.about: NS Kasnocvetna is an apricot variety developed at the Fruit Research Institute in Novi Sad. As its name suggests, it is known for its late flowering, making it suitable for areas where spring frosts are common. Thanks to its late flowering, NS Kasnocvetna has better resistance to spring frosts, reducing the risk of crop loss. The fruits are medium to large, juicy, and of excellent quality, ideal for fresh consumption and processing.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: NS Kasnocvetna fruits are medium to large, with smooth orange skin that sometimes has reddish hues. The flesh is juicy, firm, and has a sweet, pleasant taste.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
characteristics.text: This variety ripens later in the season, usually at the end of July or beginning of August, making it a mid-late apricot variety.

characteristics.title: Suitable Soil:
characteristics.text: NS Kasnocvetna performs best on fertile, well-drained soils. Although it is more resistant to frost, stable and moist soil is recommended for optimal growth.

subvarietys.about: Rocsana is a modern apricot variety that has gained popularity due to its excellent fruit quality and high productivity. This variety is especially valued for its disease resistance and stable yield. The fruits are medium to large, with bright orange skin and a pleasant sweet flavor. Rocsana is often used for fresh consumption, as well as for making jams and juices. Thanks to its resistance to frost and diseases, it is suitable for different climatic conditions and can be grown in most regions.

characteristics.title: Appearance and Taste:
characteristics.text: Rocsana fruits are large, with smooth, orange-golden skin. The flesh is juicy, firm, and very sweet, with mild fruity aromas.

characteristics.title: Harvest Season:
